title: Choose Status:
content: Are you With Den or Without Den?

title: Questionnaire:
content: Complete our (mildly fun) Google Form to help us find your perfect Denmate.

title: Chill Out For A Bit:
content: Wait for us to send you the details of your top 3 Denmate matches on WhatsApp.

title: Chat Away:
content: Connect with your matches and let us know if you hit it off, or if you want us to keep looking!
